prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Chromatic Percussion, Organ, Synth Pad, Drums, Piano, but without Guitar.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features Piano, Drums, Chromatic Percussion, Synth Pad, and Organ, but no Guitar.

Style 2:
This composition is comprised of Piano, Drums, Chromatic Percussion, Synth Pad, and Organ, omitting the Guitar.

Style 3:
Guitar-less, this song includes Piano, Drums, Chromatic Percussion, Synth Pad, and Organ.
